get_yl_ordering

Full name: ase2sprkkr.asr.projected_bandstructure.get_yl_ordering

ase2sprkkr.asr.projected_bandstructure.get_yl_ordering(yl_i, symbols)[source]

Get standardized yl ordering of keys.

Parameters:

  • yl_i (list) – see get_orbital_ldos

  • symbols (list) – Sort symbols after index in this list

Returns:

c_i – ordered index for each i

Return type:

list
